content: 1x1 rib stitch ø online video tutorial right side wrong side when working over an uneven number of stitches repeat the following two row right-leaning decrease ø online video tutorial row 1 knit the first stitch purl the next instead of knitting only one stitch at a time continue alternating between knit and purl knit two stitches together insert the front stitches until you have just one stitch left of your right needle through the first two knit this stitch stitches on the left needle then knit them together as a single stitch row 2 purl the first stitch knit the next continue alternating between purl and knit left-leaning decrease stitches until you have just one stitch left ø online video tutorial purl this stitch insert the right needle into the next stitch on the left needle knit-wise from left to to work over an even number of stitches right and slip the stitch onto the right repeat the following row needle without knitting it slip the next stitch in the same way now insert the left row 1 knit the first stitch purl the next needle through both these stitches in front how to make your elliot sweater 21 of the right needle from left to right wrap picking up stitches the yarn as for a normal knit stitch and pull ø online video tutorial the yarn through both loops at once to pick up stitches along a cast-off edge or along the side edge of your knitting insert central decrease the right needle through the first cast-off ø online video tutorial stitch or first edge stitch from front to back slip the next two stitches together knit-wise wrap the yarn around the needle and pull onto the right needle without knitting them through as for a normal knit stitch now do this is different from slip slip knit ssk the same for the next stitch along the edge as both stitches must be slipped at the same time then knit the next stitch now sometimes it is necessary to pick up more use the tip of the left needle to lift both or fewer stitches than the number of row of the slipped stitches over the last stitch along your edge to pick up fewer stitches knitted and off the right needle like when you will need to skip some stitches evenly you re casting off stitches you have now along the edge decreased by two stitches to pick up more stitches along the side increasing edge of your knitting you will have to pick ø online video tutorial up twice into some of the stitches do this make a new stitch by inserting the left by picking up the first stitch as you would needle from front to back under the strand normally then go back into the stitch and of yarn between the last stitch worked and pick up another loop the second stitch will the next stitch to be worked and lifting this look like
